metadata.title: Visual Novel Template
metadata.description: A romance-focused template with character relationships and meaningful choices
metadata.author: Whisker Team

passages.title: Morning at School
passages.content:
The morning sun streams through the classroom windows. You're early today, and only a few students have arrived.

You notice **Alex** sitting by the window, reading a book. You've been wanting to talk to them for weeks.

**Chris** waves at you from across the room. They're always friendly and cheerful.

What do you do?

choices.text: Take your seat and wait for class

passages.title: Talking with Alex
passages.content:
You walk over to Alex's desk. They look up from their book with a slight smile.

"Morning," Alex says softly. "I didn't expect anyone else to be here this early."

You notice they're reading a fantasy novel.

What do you say?

choices.text: "I like getting here early too. It's peaceful."

passages.title: Talking with Chris
passages.content:
Chris grins as you approach. "Hey! Perfect timing. I was just about to show someone this hilarious video I found last night."

They pull out their phone, already queuing up the video.

"Want to see it? Or should we talk about something else? I know you're not always into my random internet finds."

passages.title: Waiting for Class
passages.content:
You sit at your desk and pull out your homework. More students filter in as the bell approaches.

The day passes like any other. Maybe tomorrow you'll be more social.

passages.title: Book Discussion
passages.content:
Alex's eyes light up. "Oh! It's amazing so far. It's about a world where people can share dreams. The protagonist just discovered their ability to..."

They trail off, looking embarrassed. "Sorry, I get carried away."

"No, keep going!" you encourage them.

You spend the next fifteen minutes in deep conversation about fantasy worlds and storytelling. Alex seems genuinely happy to have found someone who shares their interest.

*Alex's affection increased significantly*

passages.title: Peaceful Morning
passages.content:
Alex nods. "Yeah, the quiet is nice. Everyone's so loud once school actually starts."

You sit together in comfortable silence for a moment, then Alex says, "Thanks for not making small talk. I appreciate that."

*Alex's affection increased*

passages.title: Funny Video
passages.content:
The video is actually pretty funny. You both laugh, and Chris seems pleased that you enjoyed it.

"See? I have good taste!" they joke. "Anyway, want to hang out after school? There's this new cafe that opened downtown."

*Chris's affection increased*

passages.title: Weekend Chat
passages.content:
"Oh, pretty good! I went hiking with my family. Found this amazing viewpoint where you can see the whole valley."

Chris pulls up photos on their phone. "See? I'd love to take you there sometime. The sunset from up there is incredible."

They seem sincere about the invitation.

*Chris's affection increased*

choices.text: "That sounds amazing. I'd really like that."

passages.title: End - Neutral Path
passages.content:
**End of Demo**

*Sometimes the quiet path is fine too.*
